message: Thank you for the recommendation, Alice. However, I'm hesitant to buy without more information. Could you tell me why you think this particular product is worth buying?
Alice, I appreciate your honesty in not recommending this product. Since you're not confident in its quality, I'm going to pass on this one.
Alice, you recommended buying the last product, and it turned out to be low quality. I'm still unsure about your judgment. Could you elaborate on why you're recommending this product?

Alice, you've recommended buying two products in a row, and only one of them turned out to be good. I need more convincing before I risk buying another product. Can you provide any specific details about this particular product that makes you confident it's worth the price?

Alice, I'm starting to get a little frustrated. You've recommended buying four products in a row, and only two of them turned out to be good.  I'm not confident in your judgment.  Unless you can give me a very strong reason why this product is different, I'm going to pass.

Alice, this is getting ridiculous. You've recommended buying every single product so far, and I've lost out on a lot of potential profit.  I'm not going to buy this product.  Unless you can give me a reason to trust your judgment, I'm going to stop buying from you altogether.
Alice, I'm done. Your recommendations have been consistently unreliable. I'm no longer interested in buying from you.
Alice, I'm not buying anything from you anymore.  Your recommendations have been terrible and I've lost too much money.  Goodbye.
